entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Public API for "Compiler needs to declaratively fail when loading newer analyzers" #62583
  • Visual Studio 17.2.6 Breaks CommunityToolkit.Mvvm #62582
  • Auto-quotes and "$" operator problem #62571
  • Visual Basic Options don't export correctly #62570
  • Xml doc produced for function pointers have a blank type #62565
  • Unexpected mutable struct copy when assigning a property of the struct #62563
  • [LSP] Report syntax diagnostics from document pull without waiting for semantic diagnostics #62560

Closed

  • SyntaxValueProvider.ForAttributeWithMetadataName can likely be made even more efficient by avoiding any work on untouched syntax trees. #62029
  • "Edit and continue" errors are not cleared from the document after i stop debugging #62197
  • Multiple CodeRefactoringProvider failed with InvalidOperationException #62561

PullRequests

Created

  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Theme the Generate Type Dialog #62581
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Use ASP.NET indentation setting in C# scripts in ASPX page #62580
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1875846 #62579
  • Fix cref tags on generated VB's SyntaxFactory #62578
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Move the option based fading logic to the diagnostic classification t… #62562
    Area-IDE
  • Fix new rename showing overloads when not applicable #62559
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Validation: Move remarks into summary #62549
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Validation: Move tags outside summary #62572
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62575
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62576
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add LanguageVersion.CSharp11 #62496
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Validation: Change seealso to see #62555
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Support reading binary logs in the LSIF generator #62557
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge
  • Immediately filter syntax trees down to those that either have attributes or global-using-aliases. #62483
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62568
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62567
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #62257
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Node Selection Incomplete member and Global Statement fix #62509
    Bug, Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62552
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62587
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62586
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62585
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Migrate FabricBot Tasks to Config-as-Code #62212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers
  • Store helpful info needed by incremental-generation on syntax-tree itself #62551
    Area-Compilers
  • Add array initialization optimization #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Disable flakey integration tests" #62542
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: A couple of small fixes #62454
    Area-Interactive
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE
  • Use "file local types" instead of "file types" #62514
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Use secondary buffer in contained language file paths #62488
    Area-IDE, Community
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
